title: Roasted cauliflower with Parmesan cheese
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, sliced', 'salt to taste', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/2 teaspooon dried parsley', '1 head cauliflower, broken into florets', '40g freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
